name: Transmorphers: War on Cybertron - Extinction of Bots
name_original: Transmorphers: War on Cybertron - Extinction of Bots
description:
Experience INTENSE and SUSPENSE filled action game in Transmorphers!

Join our AWESOME Transmorpher Bot friends to regain their Home Planet!
Team Up and help them with their quest to freedom!

Immerse in all-new 3D combat runner game!
RUN! DASH! and change form from a car to a bot or vice versa.

So what are you waiting for?!!
ROLL OUT!!

Game Features:
> Cool transforming robots
> Game for all ages
> Tons of fun
